item.title: 14-year-old Braden River High School student charged after Snapchat school shooting threat
item.description: The teen is being held at the Juvenile Detention Center.

item.title: Couple arrested after 5-year-old found in squalid conditions, Sarasota police say
item.description: The investigator noted the child’s hair was matted with food, and was wearing a heavily soiled diaper.

item.title: Nonprofit donates bulletproof vests to Charlotte County Sheriff’s K-9 unit
item.description: Each vest carries a powerful tribute in memory of fallen deputies or K-9s.

item.title: North Port man killed in hit-and-run crash in Naples, troopers say
item.description: Troopers say Thomas Douglas, 41, was attempting to cross U.S. 41 Sunday night

item.title: School zone cameras are doing their job, police tell city commissioners
item.description: The number of citations in school zones are down 60% citywide.

item.title: Tampa Bay Buccaneers pull off late win in Texas
item.description: Baker Mayfield led an 11-play, 80-yard drive capped by Rachaad White’s 2-yard touchdown run with 6 seconds left, and the Tampa Bay Buccaneers rallied past the Houston Texans 20-19 on Monday night.

item.title: It is slowly moving toward wetter weather
item.description: Dry air to give way to more moisture

item.title: Death investigation underway after body discovered in Venice residence
item.description: The investigation is ongoing, and residents may see an increased law enforcement presence in the area.

item.title: Actor-director Robert Redford dies at 89
item.description: Robert Redford, the Hollywood golden boy who became an Oscar-winning director, liberal activist and godfather for independent cinema under the name of one of his best-loved characters, died Tuesday at 89.

item.title: Celebrating 15 Years of Friendship Between Mérida, Mexico, and Sarasota
item.description: The Sister Cities Association of Sarasota joined us as we celebrate 15 years of friendship between the Sister Cities of Mérida, Mexico, and Sarasota, Florida.

item.title: Congress asks whether Boar’s Head deli meat plant tied to deadly outbreak will be fit to reopen
item.description: Lawmakers have summoned Boar's Head deli meat officials to face a federal food safety committee.

item.title: Dylan Walker rallying others & helping raise funds while bringing community awareness
item.description: This week’s ABC7 Athlete of the Week is Dylan Walker. He’s a senior and captain of the Out of Door Academy Thunder football team.

item.title: Deputies shoot armed man during Parrish domestic disturbance, sheriff’s office says
item.description: The suspect allegedly disobeyed commands and pulled a firearm from his waistband.

item.title: Utah prosecutors seek death penalty for suspect in Charlie Kirk shooting at UVU
item.description: In a press conference, the county attorney said Robinson is charged with seven counts, including aggravated murder.

item.title: Body discovered outside CVS on Tamiami Trail in Nokomis
item.description: Investigators said there is no threat to the public.
